description.ko: 음파의 주파수를 역동적이고 맥동하는 빛의 파동과 기하학적 패턴으로 변환하여, 소리의 물리적 실현을 탐구하는 몰입형 디지털 아트 설치물입니다.
description.en: An immersive digital art installation that transforms sonic frequencies into dynamic, pulsating light waves and geometric patterns, exploring the physical manifestation of sound.

prompt: A cinematic, high-detail visualization of sound waves as glowing neon threads, parametric architectural structures reacting to audio frequencies, dark minimalist background, 8k resolution, ethereal atmosphere, cybernetic aesthetics, volumetric lighting.
